title: Midas Auto Repair Brand Owner Mavis Tire Is Said to Weigh US IPO
description: Mavis Tire Express Services Corp., an auto repair and tire service provider that counts Midas and Tuffy among its brands, is considering a US initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.
content: Mavis Tire Express Services Corp., an auto repair and tire service provider that counts Midas and Tuffy among its brands, is considering a US initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.
